hymn.title: How pleasant and how good it is

layout.singingstanza: How plea -- sant and how good it is When breth -- ren in the Lord In one an -- oth -- er's joy de -- light And dwell in sweet ac -- cord.

lyrics.stanza: How pleasant and how good it is When brethren in the Lord In one another's joy delight And dwell in sweet accord.
Such oneness, like anointing oil On head to body poured; Such oneness, like the morning dew, With sweet refreshment stored.
To those who dwell in brotherhood The Lord His blessing sends, He crowns them with the bliss of life, Of life that never ends.
